3.eng-name: The Book Of The Prayer For Rain (Kitab al-Istisqa')

hadiths.text: Narrated An-Nu'man ibn Bashir: There was an eclipse of the sun in the time of the Prophet (ﷺ). He began to pray a series of pairs of rak'ahs enquiring about the sun (at the end of them) till it became clear

chapter.eng-name: Whoever Said That Only Two Ruku' Should Be Performed (In Eclipse Prayer)
